    Package index

    Core Plot Classes

    Core classes for creating and managing plots

    AGPlot
    AGPlot Class
    Plot
    Plot Class (Legacy)

    Geometries

    Visualization methods for rendering data

    geom_area()
    Create an area layer
    geom_bar()
    Create a bar layer
    geom_boxplot()
    Create a boxplot layer
    geom_contour()
    Create a contour layer
    geom_contour_filled()
    Create a filled contour layer
    geom_density()
    Create a density plot layer
    geom_histogram()
    Create a histogram layer
    geom_line()
    Create a line layer
    geom_point()
    Create a point layer
    geom_ribbon()
    Create a ribbon layer
    geom_smooth()
    Create a smoothed line layer with confidence intervals
    geom_violin()
    Create a violin plot layer

    StatBin

    Themes and Aesthetics

    Control the appearance of plots

    theme()
    Create a new theme
    theme_dark()
    Create a dark theme with dark background
    theme_minimal()
    Create a minimal theme with light background
    scale_color_continuous()
    Create a continuous color scale
    scale_color_discrete()
    Create a discrete color scale
    scale_continuous()
    Create a continuous scale
    coord_cartesian()
    Create Cartesian coordinates
    coord_log()
    Create log coordinates
    coord_polar()
    Create polar coordinates

    Create dodge position adjustment
    position_jitter()
    Create a jitter position adjustment
    position_stack()
    Create stack position adjustment

    Utility Functions

    Helper functions for color palettes and layout

    animate_time_series()
    Create a time series animation
    animate_transition()
    Create a transition animation
    annotate_arrow()
    Create an arrow annotation
    annotate_reference_line()
    Create a reference line annotation
    annotate_text()
    Create a text annotation
    arrange_plots()
    Create a new layout
    create_legend()
    Create a new legend
    palette_colorblind()
    Colorblind-friendly color palette
    palette_custom()
    Create a custom color palette
    palette_default()
    Default color palette with standard colors
    palette_diverging()
    Diverging color palette for highlighting differences above/below a middle point
    palette_sequential()
    Sequential color palette for ordered data
    plot_grid()
    Create a grid of plots
